issue.title: [Python] Support lazy Dataset.filter
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17212](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17212). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Given that when possible we would like to keep Dataset and Table with a similar enough API that allows to perform most convenient operations on Dataset without having to materialise it to a table, it would be good to add proper support for a `Dataset.filter` method like the one we have on `Table.filter`
